query.sql: SELECT e.employee_code, e.employee_id, e.employee_name, p.project_name, p.project_id, p.price, SUM(p.price) total_price, COUNT(1) total_date, (select count(1) from gc_work_record ar where e.employee_id = ar.employee_id AND p.project_id = ar.project_id and IFNULL(ar.settlement_flag,'N') = 'Y' ) settle_total_date, (select count(1) from gc_work_record ar where e.employee_id = ar.employee_id AND p.project_id = ar.project_id and IFNULL(ar.settlement_flag,'N') = 'Y' )*price settle_total_price, (select count(1) from gc_work_record ar where e.employee_id = ar.employee_id AND p.project_id = ar.project_id and IFNULL(ar.settlement_flag,'N') = 'N' )*price unsettle_total_price, (select count(1) from gc_work_record ar where e.employee_id = ar.employee_id AND p.project_id = ar.project_id and IFNULL(ar.settlement_flag,'N') = 'N' ) unsettle_total_date FROM gc_employee e, gc_work_record r, gc_project p WHERE e.employee_id = r.employee_id AND p.project_id = r.project_id #AND_CLAUSE# GROUP BY e.employee_code, e.employee_name, p.project_name, p.price

query.name: detail
query.sql: SELECT e.employee_code, e.employee_id, e.employee_name, p.project_name, r.work_date, p.price, IFNULL(r.settlement_flag,'N') settlement_flag, r.settlement_date FROM gc_employee e, gc_work_record r, gc_project p WHERE e.employee_id = r.employee_id AND p.project_id = r.project_id and p.project_id = ${@project_id} and e.employee_id = ${@employee_id}
